page.title: 08FENSTANTON VILLAGE POND
page.content: {The village pond}is opposite the clock tower.There is an old tree in the middle.You can hear and see the soft rustle of the birds in the trees. {The deep ,blue-green pond}has tall green reeds growing in the water. There are{small flakes of wood {floating on the surface.}The remains of{an old tree}are rotting away,and a {mallard}is swimming{around. { Wild plants}are growing round the {Elms and oaks}while the{baby trees start to grow in the forest-like surroundings of the pond. { }The are{two moorhens,}one female and one male.He is black and his beak is very bright orange.{At the pond there many different{insects}like butterflys,flys,dragon-flys and blue-bottles. {By { Catherine Sutton
